attributes.action: adopt the US system of Motorway driving, IE making lane switching an offence and allowing overtaking in anylane (this will resolve the hundreds of suggest petitions regarding people hogging the centre lane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IE making lane switching an offence and allowing overtaking in anylane (this will resolve the hundreds of suggested petitions regarding people hogging the centre lane.  Also far easier to police
